package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
)

func main() {
	rsp, err := http.Get("https://baidu.com")
	if err != nil {
		fmt.Printf("get error err=%s", err.Error())
		return
	}

	contents := [1024]byte{}
	len, err := rsp.Body.Read(contents[:])
	if err != nil {
		fmt.Printf("Read error err=%s", err.Error())
		return
	}
	fmt.Printf("body=%s", contents[:len])
}
